originalTitle: Mali lawmaker jailed in Ivory Coast for insulting president
title: Mali lawmaker jailed in Ivory Coast for insulting president
content: Prosecutors say Mamadou Hawa Gassama described Alassane Ouattara as a "tyrant" and "an enemy of Mali".

originalTitle: South Africa and Israel expel each other's envoys in diplomatic row
title: South Africa and Israel expel each other's envoys in diplomatic row
content: South Africa accuses the Israeli envoy of insulting President Ramaphosa. Israel says the expulsion is "baseless".

originalTitle: Music legend Fela Kuti becomes first African to get Grammys Lifetime Achievement Award
title: Music legend Fela Kuti becomes first African to get Grammys Lifetime Achievement Award
content: Almost 30 years after he died, the Nigerian will posthumously receive a Lifetime Achievement Award.

originalTitle: Iran says ready for ‘fair’ talks with US but not ‘under shadow of threats’
title: Iran says ready for ‘fair’ talks with US but not ‘under shadow of threats’
content: Iran's foreign minister says missile programme not up for negotiation as Trump says sending more ships to the region.

originalTitle: After Trump call, Russia agrees to pause attacks on Kyiv amid cold spell
title: After Trump call, Russia agrees to pause attacks on Kyiv amid cold spell
content: The Kremlin says it’s agreed to halt attacks on Kyiv and nearby towns until February 1, after a request from the US.

originalTitle: US protesters begin nationwide strike as DOJ launches Pretti killing probe
title: US protesters begin nationwide strike as DOJ launches Pretti killing probe
content: Protesters call for 'no work, no school, no shopping' in response to Trump's deadly immigration enforcement crackdown.

originalTitle: UN risks 'imminent financial collapse', secretary general warns
title: UN risks 'imminent financial collapse', secretary general warns
content: António Guterres says the international body could run out of money by July due to members' unpaid fees.

originalTitle: Trump picks Kevin Warsh to lead the US Federal Reserve
title: Trump picks Kevin Warsh to lead the US Federal Reserve
content: The 55-year-old economist had been considered for Fed chair during Trump's first term.

originalTitle: Luigi Mangione will not face death penalty if convicted, judge rules
title: Luigi Mangione will not face death penalty if convicted, judge rules
content: A judge dismisses two federal counts against the 27-year-old, but he still faces state murder charges.

originalTitle: Are Arsenal fans making team nervous in title race?
title: Are Arsenal fans making team nervous in title race?
content: Is a nervousness among Arsenal fans affecting the players in the Premier League title race? Alex Howell looks at what impact this could have on Mikel Arteta's side as they look to end a run of three second-placed finishes.

originalTitle: Carrick not ruling out Man Utd deadline day moves
title: Carrick not ruling out Man Utd deadline day moves
content: Manchester United's interim head coach Michael Carrick is not ruling out the possibility of the club doing business on transfer deadline day

originalTitle: Benfica meet Real in play-offs after dramatic league phase encounter
title: Benfica meet Real in play-offs after dramatic league phase encounter
content: Benfica will face Real Madrid in the Champions League play-offs just three weeks after their dramatic league phase encounter.
